sentence.Network_en: I think the brown hair would fit you more than this ash blonde.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得褐色头发比浅黄色头发更适合你.

sentence.Network_en: Weather satellites have observed a ring of volcanic ash girdling the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 气象卫星观测到一个环绕地球的火山灰带。

sentence.Network_en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentence.Network_cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

list.abs: 2 暗金色/Dark Blonde 暗金色/Dark Blonde 3 暗棕色/Dark Brown 暗棕色/Dark Brown 4 灰金色/Ash Blonde 灰金色/Ash Blonde 5 浅灰色/Light Grey 浅灰色/.

auth_sentence.content: My journal's called The Life of a Blonde.
auth_sentence.res_content: My journal's called The Life of a Blonde.

auth_sentence.content: There's a pretty redhead and a flirtatious blonde.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's a pretty redhead and a flirtatious blonde.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a pretty redhead and a flirtatious blonde.

auth_sentence.content: She was white-blonde as a baby and so pretty.
